title: 주말 여행 이야기
description: 과거에 있었던 주말 여행에 대한 글을 읽고 이해합니다.

passage.text:
Last weekend, my family and I went on a trip to the mountains. We left home early on Saturday morning and drove for two hours.

When we arrived, the weather was beautiful. The sky was blue and the air was fresh. We hiked up a mountain trail and saw many beautiful flowers and trees. At the top of the mountain, we ate our packed lunch and enjoyed the amazing view.

In the afternoon, we visited a small village near the mountains. The people there were very friendly. We bought some fresh vegetables and fruits from a local market.

On Sunday morning, we went fishing at a lake. My brother caught three fish! We cooked the fish for lunch and they were delicious.

We came back home on Sunday evening. Everyone was tired but happy. It was one of the best weekends ever!
